title: Noteworthy Wednesday Option Activity: SBUX, ATVI, KR - Nasdaq.com
text: Among the underlying components of the S&P 500 index, we saw noteworthy options trading volume today in Starbucks Corp. (Symbol: SBUX), where a total of 67,290 contracts have traded so far, representing approximately 6.7 million underlying shares. That amounts to about 108.9% of SBUX's average daily trading volume over the past month of 6.2 million shares. Especially high volume was seen for the $93.50 strike put option expiring September 06, 2019 , with 2,584 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 258,400 underlying shares of SBUX. Below is a chart showing SBUX's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $93.50 strike highlighted in orange:
